title: China massing military ships across region in show of maritime force, sources say
description: China is deploying a large number of naval and coast guard vessels across East Asian waters, at one point more than 100, in the largest maritime show of force to date, according to four sources and intelligence reports reviewed by Reuters. China is in the mid…
